title: Tag
description: Draws attention to new or important content, categorizes information, or indicates counts

frontMatter.title: Tag
frontMatter.description: Draws attention to new or important content, categorizes information, or indicates counts

variations.name: Tag - Status
variations.description: For status communication with semantic colors

when_to_use.value: Highlight new or important content on a page
Categorize results by topic, type, or other classification
Indicate quantity or count of items (e.g., unread emails)

when_to_consider_else.value: **For status communication**: Use [Tag - Status](./tag-status) instead when communicating current state with semantic color meaning
**Risk of confusion with buttons**: Conduct usability testing if users might mistake tags for interactive elements
**As page titles**: Use the Eyebrow header style for descriptive titles
**As links**: Use the Critical Action component if interactivity is needed

accessibility.value: All variations meet WCAG 2.2 AA color contrast requirements
Should not interfere with Tab key navigation flow
Announced as text content without additional context
Tag text must be clear and meaningful when heard in isolation
For dynamic content updates, use `aria-live="polite"` (non-urgent) or `aria-live="assertive"` (critical)
Maintain consistent placement and behavior across the application
Use simple language avoiding technical jargon
